title: Outward bound
creator_credit: Summit Films, Crystal Productions, Barry Corbet, Roger C. Brown, Robert Fulton and Joern Gerdts
brief_description: The benefits of the outward bound course, including increased autonomy and knowledge of people, and the psychological kick to be had from danger. Good photography and much use of music. This is not an instructional film.
